openGraph.title: 7digital
openGraph.description: Subscription API for Samsung Music Hub

quote.text: On the technical side Featurist built precisely the right amount we needed and what they did was to an exceptional standard. On the operational side Featurist went above and beyond the call of a typical software team. They had an amazing ability to root out and pursue the issues that needed solving up and down the chain of the organisation to ensure we could deliver on time.We owe a huge amount to Featurist and I would not hesitate in recommending them. We have very high standards at 7digital and Featurist regularly excelled.
quote.author: Rob Bowley, 7digital / Director of Technology
